title: Overcoming the Challenges of Collaboratively Adopting Artificial Intelligence in the Public Sector
research_description: This study explores the challenges and organizational routines involved in adopting AI tools in interorganizational collaborations within the public sector in England, focusing on two regional governments and a research university.
research_results: The study identifies key challenges, including data privacy concerns, misalignment of interests, and lack of understanding of required data, and presents organizational routines to address these issues.
future_research: Future research could investigate further case studies on the adoption of AI in different public sectors and organizational environments.
